ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Fire pot ports...
ygData.msgSnippet: Funny you should ask, there is a Dragon type mob that swims about the area. Its not a big deal on my server because he will be killed shortly after he spawns
ygData.messageBody:
Funny you should ask, there is a Dragon type mob that swims about the area.
Its not a big deal on my server because he will be killed shortly after he
spawns but on other servers it might be a really big deal. I forget his
name off hand.

Mu
-----Original Message-----
From: Sean Buvala [mailto:sean@...]
Sent: Sunday, May 20, 2001 2:56 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Fire pot ports...


How dangerous of a swim is it to these firepots from the closest island or
inn?

Thanks!
